Package main

package main
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AttackPotion
    A subclass of Items this is the attack potion that will increase the monsters attack by 20 and decrease the gold by 15 when bought and increase gold by 10 when sold
    Battle
    An instance of this class is used to have the user battle, can also be thought of as a battle
    BattleWindow
    An class which uses Java Swing to create a window, used in conjunction with an instance of Battle, that the user may fight battles
    EnvironmentWindow
    An class which uses Java Swing to create a window, used in conjunction with an instance of Player, to start the game
    Everest
    A subclass of monster this can be thought as a particular type of monster, has its own unique instance variables which are different from the other Monster subclasses
    Flame
    A subclass of monster this can be thought as a particular type of monster, has its own unique instance variables which are different from the other Monster subclasses
    GameWindow
    An abstract class which every class that creates a Window using Java Swing will extend, contains methods reused by each of this subclasses
    Gloomlops
    A subclass of monster this can be thought as a particular type of monster, has its own unique instance variables which are different from the other Monster subclasses
    Goolops
    A subclass of monster this can be thought as a particular type of monster, has its own unique instance variables which are differnt from the other Monster subclasses
    HealthPotion
    A subclass of Items this is the Health Potion that will increase the Monsters health by 25 and decrease the gold by 10 when bought and increase gold by 5 when sold
    Items
    A subclass of Purchasable that sets all the details of the items in the shop
    Jerry
    A subclass of monster this can be thought as a particular type of monster, has its own unique instance variables which are different from the other Monster subclasses
    LvlUpPotion
    A subclass of Items this is the Level Up Potion that will increase the Monsters XP by 10 and decrease the gold by 25 when bought and increase gold by 20 when sold
    MainWindow
    An class which uses Java Swing to create a window, used in conjunction with instances of classes Battle, Shop, Player and "Window" classes such as BattleWindow, MenuWindow and ShopWindow, to provide the main game play loop of the game
    MaxHealthPotion
    A subclass of Items this is the Max Health Potion that will increase the Monsters max health by 50 and decrease the gold by 50 when bought and increase gold by 25 when sold
    MenuWindow
    An class which uses Java Swing to create a window, used in conjunction with an instance of Player, that the user may manage their monsters and items
    monJoins
    A subclass of RandomEvent, an instance of this class is a "Random Event
    MonJoinsWindow
    The class that implements the GUI needed to run the monJoins random event
    monLeaves
    A subclass of RandomEvent, an instance of this class is a "Random Event
    monRandLvlUp
    A subclass of RandomEvent, an instance of this class is a "Random Event
    Monster
    An instance of this class is a monster, but in this game only intances of this classes sub classes are ever made
    Parihaka
    A subclass of monster this can be thought as a particular type of monster, has its own unique instance variables which are differnt from the other Monster subclasses
    Player
    A class which holds all the details of the user the name they wish to go by, their items, and monsters etc.
    Purchasable
    A class in which the items and monsters that are bought from the shop have their details set and will extend
    RandomEvent
    An abstract class that has subclasses that are random events and all must implement the method startEvent
    Shop
    The shop class will have the place where the player can buy and sell monsters and items
    ShopMenu
    An class which uses Java Swing to create a window, used in conjunction with an instance of Shop, that the user may go to the Shop
    suddenLevel
    A subclass of RandomEvent, an instance of this class is a "Random Event
    Vesuvius
    A subclass of monster this can be thought as a particular type of monster, has its own unique instance variables which are different from the other Monster subclasses
    WindowManager
    This class is used to start the game, only manages two windows enviWindow and mainWindow
    Youngly
    A subclass of monster this can be thought as a particular type of monster, has its own unique instance variables which are differnt from the other Monster subclasses
